movies.title: Hercules
movies.actors: Biswajit Chakraborty , Parambrata Chatterjee , Saswata Chatterjee
movies.plot: Hercules is the story of a common man: His actual name is Harakailash, his timid nature and compromising attitude has prompted the local people to call him Hercules in jest.
movies.name: Hercules

movies.title: Avengers
movies.actors: Linda Ballantyne , Tony Daniels , Ron Rubin
movies.plot: This series tells the stories of Marvel Comics greatest general membership superhero teams (as opposed to a family organization like the Fantastic Four or a minority group organization like the X-Men). Led by Hank Pym as Ant-Man and Janet van Dyne as the Wasp, they fight evil around the world and beyond against threats like Ultron.
movies.name: Avengers
